boardgame.name: Defenders of the Realm
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Our Liege is in desperate hour! From what grievous cause have these accursed races arisen? Orcs, Dragons, Demons and the Dead make haste towards Monarch City. The King and Countryside of Monarch City is in need of valiant Heroes!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Will you answer the King's call?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the ancient Citadel of Monarch City, the King calls to arms the finest Heroes to defend against a Darkness that engulfs the land. You and your allies must embark on a journey to defend the countryside, repair the tainted lands, and defeat the four creature factions before any of them enter the City. And they approach from all sides! Fast populating Orcs! Fierce Dragons! Undead that bring Fear! And Demons! All tainting the land in their wake. There are several paths to defeat, but only one path to victory, and only the most valiant Hero will be named King's Champion._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Defenders of the Realm is a cooperative fantasy board game in which 1-4 players take a role as one of the King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Champions (Choose from Cleric, Dwarf, Eagle Rider, Paladin, Ranger, Rogue, Sorcerer and Wizard). You, as one of the King's Heroes make use of strategy, special abilities, cooperation, card play and a little luck in Defenders of the Realm for a unique experience every adventure. But be forewarned! There is never time to rest. As each Enemy General is struck down in battle, the remaining dark forces only grow more difficult to vanquish and their march to Monarch City gets faster with each Hero victory!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

FRED Distribution (FDD 101253N) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Our Liege is in desperate hour! From what grievous cause have these accursed races arisen? Orcs, Dragons, Demons and the Dead make haste towards Monarch City. The King and Countryside of Monarch City is in need of valiant Heroes!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Will you answer the King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s call? In the ancient Citadel of Monarch City, the King calls to arms the finest Heroes to defend against a Darkness that engulfs the land. You and your allies must embark on a journey to defend the countryside, repair the tainted lands, and defeat the four creature factions before one of them enters the City. And they approach from all sides! Fast populating Orcs! Fierce Dragons! Undead that bring Terror! And Demons! All tainting the land in their wake. There are several paths to defeat, but only one path to victory, and only the most valiant Hero will be named King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Champion. Defenders of the Realm is a cooperative fantasy board game in which 1-4 players take a role as one of the King’s Champions (Choose from Cleric, Dwarf, Eagle Rider, Paladin, Ranger, Rogue, Sorcerer and Wizard). You, as one of the King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Heroes make use of strategy, special abilities, cooperation, card play and a little luck in Defense of the Realm for a unique experience every adventure. But be forewarned! There is never time to rest. As each Enemy General is struck down in battle, the remaining dark forces only grow more difficult to vanquish and their march to Monarch City gets faster with each Hero victory!

Got this for Christmas along with pandemic. Where I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m a Biologist the theme of pandemic is more to my liking. However there is one factor that I enjoy more about Defenders of the Realm. Its co-op like Pandemic though you have more control over what you do. You can choose to go on solo quests and beef up your hero thus making a bigger solo contribution to the group. A little more lateral freedom would of been nice in Pandemic. The game has been played 3 times, its practically new minus the shrink wrap. I found the playing time to be shorter then advertised which was nice. With four players our 3 games timed at: First game took 80 mins (win), 2nd game took 35 mins (lost) 3rd game took 48 mins (win). The theme of the game oozes with fantasy which is nice if your a fantasy lover. My wife sadly isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t thus one more reason Pandemic will get played more then this one. Shoot me an email if interested or a (reasonable) OBO. Happy Gaming!
